item.content:encoded:
[text* fname placeholder "First Name"]

[email* email placeholder "Email Address"]
[tel* tel placeholder "Phone Number"]
[select* position class:cs-select include_blank "eSports & Competition" "Senior Game Programmer" "Art Director" "Senior Server Engineer" "Social Media Manager" "Other"]
